00184             function                register_owner( $OwnerId , $OwnerType )
00185             {
00186                   try
00187                   {
00188                         if( $this->Owners === false )
00189                         {
00190                               $this->Owners = array();
00191                         }
00192                         
00193                         foreach( $this->Owners as $i => $Owner )
00194                         {
00195                               if( $Owner[ 'id' ] == $OwnerId && $Owner[ 'type' ] == $OwnerType )
00196                               {
00197                                     return;
00198                               }
00199                         }
00200                         
00201                         $this->Owners [] = array( 'id' => $OwnerId , 'type' => $OwnerType );
00202                   }
00203                   catch( Exception $e )
00204                   {
00205                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00206                   }
00207             }

00231             function                object_has_owner( $ObjectId , $ObjectType )
00232             {
00233                   try
00234                   {
00235                         if( $this->Owners === false )
00236                         {
00237                               throw( new Exception( "No owners were registered" ) );
00238                         }
00239                         
00240                         foreach( $this->Owners as $i => $Owner )
00241                         {
00242                               if( $this->Link->link_exists( $Owner[ 'id' ] , $ObjectId , $Owner[ 'type' ] , $ObjectType ) )
00243                               {
00244                                     return( true );
00245                               }
00246                         }
00247                         
00248                         return( false );
00249                   }
00250                   catch( Exception $e )
00251                   {
00252                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00253                   }
00254             }

00284                   try

00287                         {
00288                               return( false );
